formulas.raw: Church tax on assessed income tax: $$ K = r \times \mathrm{ESt} $$ where the rate is $$ r = \begin{cases} 0.08 & \text{for Bavaria and Baden\text{-}Württemberg} \\ 0.09 & \text{for all other federal states} \end{cases} $$ Optional cap (Kappung): $$ K_{\mathrm{final}} = \min\left( K,\; c \times \mathrm{zvE} \right) $$ Church tax on capital gains (with 25% flat tax): $$ K_{\mathrm{capital}} = r \times 0.25 \times C $$ Monthly amount: $$ K_{\mathrm{month}} = \dfrac{K_{\mathrm{final}}}{12} $$
